name: Papirgutt
description:
Play as a Norwegian postman, rumour has it this man used to deliver newspapers when he was a boy.

Avoid obstacles, try not to roll the snowmobile, don't cause any damage to residents property by throwing their papers through any windows. 

Single Player/Two Player - Delivery Mode

Arcade Games:

Long Throw

Snowmobile Curling

Deer Herder

Rally

                             

Mouse - Camera View

W - Throttle

S - Brake

X - Reverse

A/D - Turn

C - Set Cruise Control

Q/E - Left/Right Throw 

R - Swap throwing item

P2 Controls - J/L & I/K - Camera

Arrows - Snowmobile control

Numpad 0 - Reverse

Keypad Enter - Cruise

Delete /PgDn- Left Throw/Right Throw

End - Swap throwing item
